name: @nota/nativescript-webview-ext
description: Extended WebView for NativeScript which adds 'x-local' scheme for local-files. events between WebView and native-layer, javascript execution, injecting CSS and JS-files.

scripts.build: npm i && npm-run-all build:webview-bridge build:polyfill ngc tsc
scripts.build:webview-bridge: export WWW_OUTDIR=$PWD/www; cd $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/www-src && npm i && npm run build -- --outDir ${WWW_OUTDIR}
scripts.build:typings: npm run build && (cd ../demo && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$PWD/../typings" tns build ios) && cp ../typings/i386/*NotaWebViewExt.d.ts platforms/ios/NotaWebViewExt.d.ts
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-webview-ext && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.tscwatch: npm run build:webview-bridge && npm run tsc -- -w
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel build:webview-bridge:watch plugin.tscwatch run.demo.ios run.http-server
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel build:webview-bridge:watch plugin.tscwatch run.demo.android run.http-server
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel build:webview-bridge:watch plugin.tscwatch run.test.ios
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel build:webview-bridge:watch plugin.tscwatch run.test.android
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-webview-ext && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
